import React from "react" import Moment from "react-moment" import {useSelector} from "react-redux" //components import HammerButton from "./HammerButton" const Post = (props) => { const users = useSelector((state) => state.getUsersReducer.users) const getDataStuffs = async () => { const result = await users.find(({userId}) => userId === props.post.userId) const firstName = await result.firstName const profileImage = await result.profileImage return { firstName, profileImage, } } console.log(getDataStuffs()) return (
{getDataStuffs()}

{props.post.createdAt._seconds}

{props.post.postText}

Be the first to Hammer down

) } export default Post
